llm.feedback:

Insert a concise causal‑chain clause as a separate sentence: “Fed tightening raises the federal funds rate, compresses short‑term rates, widens the UST 2‑yr/10‑yr spread, and lifts mortgage rates via the real‑rate component” (LF0UUL917).  
Keep the remaining five sentences unchanged, but ensure each ends with the appropriate citation IDs (U21K4ALYQ, 97MD1FHW8, LF0UUL917).  
This yields 6 sentences (within the 4–6‑sentence limit), satisfies the mapping requirement to a canonical handle (UST 10‑yr), and preserves the explicit magnitude ranges, catalyst window, risks, watch items, and confidence level.
